attributes.action: I would like the Government to remove Mark Regev from his post here in UK.
attributes.background: I belive that Mark Regev should not be working for the government in this country as it shows a lack of commitment by this government to the Palestinian people's. Mark Regev has used his posistions to spread pro Israelis narrative which is counterproductive to a forward thinking peace deal.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions regarding the appointment of ambassadors to the UK are the responsibility of foreign governments.
